# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #104](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#104)

#### Leiyan

Doesn't Shadows of Silence happen in there too?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Threnody? No. Threnody is not one of the three.

#### Footnote

in the Rosharan system
